item.description:
Zen Bar in Plainville, Connecticut is Everything to Everyone. For over a decade the Zen Bar has been the entertainment headquarter for central and western Connecticut and the #1 home for LIVE Bands and Karaoke

Put on your dancing shoes tonight!

Avenue Groove is a Connecticut based band formed in 2007 consisting of six very talented and dedicated musicians playing R&B/Funk/Dance Music.

Known for being extremely tight and having fantastic vocals (5 of them), Avenue Groove is very well received wherever they perform. If you think that Avenue Groove is just “Another Cover Band” …. Think Again! Come see

for yourself.

Come mingle with the group at 8:00 and grab a drink and appetizer from the bar menu, the band starts at 9:00.  There are also a couple of pool tables at the opposite end of the bar from the stage.  

 

 

 

http://www.avenuegroove.com/page2/page2.html

 http://www.zenbar.com/menu/
item.how_to_find_us: I will save a table in front of the stage area.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Shake off the Blizzard Blues! Dancing to Avenue Groove at Zen Bar
